snippet: There is little precedent in New York for the intense day-to-day political partnership that Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio and his wife, Chirlane McCray, intend to bring to City Hall on Jan. 1.
abstract: There is little precedent in New York for the intense day-to-day political partnership that Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio and his wife Chirlane McCray intend to bring to City Hall; together, the pair map out political strategies and deliberate policies, among other things, insisting on degree of equality and collaboration that is rarely found between elected officials and their spouses.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM

lead_paragraph: There is little precedent in New York for the intense day-to-day political partnership that Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio and his wife, Chirlane McCray, intend to bring to City Hall on Jan. 1.

headline.main: At de Blasio’s City Hall, Expect an Outsize Role for His Wife
headline.print_headline: At de Blasio’s City Hall, Expect an Outsize Role for His Spouse
